activities: CCE uses certain internet-based human resource information management tools and information systems as well as a Hotline to conduct employment related activities to include recruitment and ongoing employee data maintenance, in addition to other methods of receiving information from you.  The use of these systems requires individuals to provide personal data about themselves or personal data may be processed by CCE using these systems within the course of employment.  CCE may also capture personal data about consumers, customers, contractors or suppliers in the course of conducting business with them, through its information systems and other avenues of communication, in accordance with the applicable law of the relevant country.  You will be told the purpose for which the information is collected and used when you are asked to provide the information or soon thereafter.
eucountries: Belgium, Bulgaria, France, Luxembourg, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data about consumers, customers, suppliers, and HR
